document_data.caption: A map showing the location of the Golden Harp Inn on Skulls Street.
document_data.name: Golden Harp Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Golden Harp Inn''' was an [[inn]] located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The inn was located in the far northeast corner of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] on [[Skulls Street]] just west of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The Golden Harp inn stood two stories tall and was built from stone and slate. The interior was cheery and well-lit. A magical [[harp]] sometimes floated about the inn playing music for patrons.
